scripts.init: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run clean && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.compile: lerna run --scope @wetrial/use-request compile && lerna run --scope @wetrial/hooks compile
scripts.build: node ./scripts/clean-old-build.js && father build && npm run compile && node ./scripts/build-wind-up.js
scripts.patch: yarn version --patch && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.minor: yarn version --minor && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.major: yarn version --major && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
